name: Games for Toddlers
overview: A set of video games designed specifically for toddlers. Each game is simple and uses the Wii U™ GamePad Touch Screen. A-mazing: Guide the boy through the maze. A new and unique maze is generated for you every time you play. Choose from 3 different maze sizes. Icy Block Stacker: Carefully stack the icy blocks on top of each other. Happy Cat: Traverse the trees in the forest for as long as possible. Egg Hunt: Help the the Easter Bunny collect Easter eggs.
